import React from 'react' import Timer from './Timer.js' import Bars, {MAX_SPEED,MIN_SPEED} from './Bars.js' export default class Header extends React.Component { render(){ let speed="" if (this.state.animation_speed>120)speed="very fast" else if (this.state.animation_speed>90)speed="fast" else if (this.state.animation_speed>50)speed="medium" else speed="slow" let max =Math.floor(window.innerWidth/25*0.9) let min=Math.floor(window.innerWidth/25*0.25) return (
{/* */}
) } }
